mapper.sql: app_id, app_name, app_content, app_version, app_size, app_reserve, app_platform, app_update_time, app_version_code
mapper.select: select from biz_app where app_platform = #{appPlatform} order by app_Update_Time desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into biz_app (app_id, app_name, app_content, app_version, app_size, app_reserve, app_platform, app_update_time) values (#{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appReserve,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into biz_app
app_name,
app_content,
app_version,
app_size,
app_reserve,
app_platform,
app_update_time,
app_version_code,

mapper.update:
update biz_app
app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_content = #{appContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_version = #{appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_size = #{appSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_reserve = #{appReserve,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_platform = #{appPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_update_time = #{appUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
app_version_code = #{appVersionCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update biz_app set app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_content = #{appContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_version = #{appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_size = #{appSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_reserve = #{appReserve,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_platform = #{appPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_update_time = #{appUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
